head.title: Where the Shows Are (or Will Be)

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

hedline.hl1: Where the Shows Are (or Will Be)

abstract.p: Charts of new television season; photos (Special Section: Television) (L)

block.p: The new television season is arriving later than ever; for the rest of this month it will keep falling into place. Here is what prime time is scheduled to look like on the six major broadcast networks once all the shows have found their homes. (Keep in mind that some of the new shows may not last that long.) The Times's television critics, Caryn James and Julie Salamon, have selected 14 shows - some new, some old - that they'll be watching with particular interest.
